page.title: 08A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: {SUNDAY,JUNE 30th.....CARL WALPOLE (11) GOT UP 9.13AM.HAD SOME CORNFLAKES.WENT ROUND FOR SIMON,BUT HE WASN'T COMING OUT.(HE WAS STILL ASLEEP!) WENT HOME AND CLEANED MY BIKES AND THEN HELPED MUM ON THE PATIO.SIMON CAME ROUND,SO WE HAD A CUP OF TEA,A BISCUIT AND A GOSSIP! I SAID "SHALL WE HAVE A GO_KART RACE?"BUT SIMON SAID HE'D CRASHED HIS AND NOW IT ONLY HAD THREE WHEELS! WENT UP TO SIMON'S,PICKED UP HIS KART AND TOOK IT BACK TO MINE.WE SPENT SOME TIME FIXING IT,THEN TRIED IT OUT ON ROTTEN MARSH HILL.HALF WAY DOWN THE WHEEL FELL OFF AGAIN! WE WENT BACK TO MINE AND MADE A TENT FROM AN OLD BLANKET.COLIN CAME ROUND TO PLAY FOR A WHILE .I HAD TEA (ROAST CHICKEN) THEN WENT OUT TO PLAY FOOTBALL.I TOLD MUM I'D BE HOME AT 8.30,BUT THE OTHERS HAD TO BE IN BY 8.00,SO I WAS EARLY.I HAD A BATH AND WENT TO BED ABOUT 10 PM
